html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-10312023-10-18AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectOrder providing for assistance to British Columbia, Alberta and Saskatchewan livestock and agricultural producers
PrecisOrder authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into the AGREEMENTS with the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta and Saskatchewan to provide federal contributions of up to $219 million under the AGRICULTURAL DISASTER RELIEF PROGRAM (AgriRecovery) to assist with the extraordinary costs of livestock producers impacted by the drought and the agricultural producers impacted by wildfires in 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order providing for assistance to British Columbia, Alberta and Saskatchewan livestock and agricultural producers
precis: Order authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into the AGREEMENTS with the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta and Saskatchewan to provide federal contributions of up to $219 million under the AGRICULTURAL DISASTER RELIEF PROGRAM (AgriRecovery) to assist with the extraordinary costs of livestock producers impacted by the drought and the agricultural producers impacted by wildfires in 2023.
